choices.1: Here is a cat, The cat do nothing, just scrolled in the sunny. You can try to touch him
choices.2: There is no cat, just a pile of shit and flies. en...the smell is terrible.
choices.3: Wow, lucky dog, do you want to exchange something with me ? The cat says.

answers.1: Wheezing with the cat, it seems very happy, his tail just swing in the air.
answers.2: Oh..no, you stepped on the shit.

3.message: See you inventory. maybe nothing or some dragon-bones.

data.prefix: The egyptian says cat live with the God.
